turn.0: Eli5 the caste system in India. How do you know which caste you are in? How does it effect everyday life?
turn.1: Yup. For example my ancestors used to be priests hundreds of years ago and I have one of the variation of the last name for a brahaman cast. It's a very common name so most of the people can recognise it easily enough.
turn.3: I assume they are part of the Vaishya cast. But again not 100% sure. I don't really care about the last name or cast. I just know a few from what I have seen or heard around me.
turn.4: Just asking because I’ve known multiple Patel doctors.  Probably just coincidence or common like the name Smith.
turn.5: Yeah it's very common. Perfect comparison with Smith.
